Heard was married to entertainer Johnny Depp from 2015 to 2017. Their separation drew critical media attention as she claimed that he had been oppressive through the majority of their relationship. He then, at that point, sued her for slander in 2019 after Heard composed a commentary talking about being a public survivor of abusive behavior at home. He additionally sued the distributors of The Sun in a connected criticism suit in England. In 2020, the High Court of Justice of England and Wales decided that Depp had lost his defamation case and that most of Heard's charges had been demonstrated to a common norm.

Consistently is Bring Your Daughter to Work Day for new mother Amber Heard. 

"I'm simply the mother and the father. She's the chief ," Heard, 35, captioned an Instagram photograph of her dealing with a PC while holding child little girl Oonagh Paige. 

Heard invited her child girl in April with the assistance of a substitute, yet delayed until July 1 to make her pregnancy declaration. A source advised us solely that Heard is "past in affection" with Oonagh Paige, named out of appreciation for her mother Paige, who died in May 2020. 

"Oonagh is totally flawless, and Amber is astounded. She generally realized that she needed to be a mother, and this is her most noteworthy desire to work out. She's so thankful to the awesome lady who brought Oonagh into her life." 

Since sharing the news, Heard has posted recordings on her Instagram of her and her girl carrying on with their coexistence. The entertainer has been connected to cinematographer Bianca Butti since January 2020, however we're told Heard is "pleased" to be Oonagh's sole lawful parent. 

Also, perhaps Oonagh will get an opportunity to escape Heard's office and onto her set. The entertainer is next continuing her job as Atlantean princess Mera in "Aquaman 2," inverse Jason Momoa in the lead spot. 

Amber Heard is a mom!The entertainer, 35, is commending the introduction of a child young lady — months after ex Johnny Depp lost his defamation case including her. 

A source only disclosed to Page Six on Thursday that Heard is "past in affection" with her girl, Oonagh Paige, whom she named after her late mother, Paige. Oonagh was brought into the world on April 8 with the assistance of a substitute after Heard was advised she could always be unable to convey her own child, companions uncovered. 

"The main thing for Amber is that she's open with regards to Oonagh's introduction to the world," the source proceeded. "There are so many ladies who feel they can't discuss their fruitfulness and are stressed and humiliated; Amber needs them to feel upheld and understand that there are a large number of approaches to have a child regardless of whether you have ripeness issues." 

Heard affirmed the news herself on Thursday by means of Instagram, where she imparted a photograph of herself to the newborn child. 

She added, "A piece of me needs to maintain that my private life is not anybody's issue to worry about. I likewise get that the idea of my work propels me to assume liability for this. My little girl was brought into the world on April 8, 2021. Her name is Oonagh Paige Heard. She's the start of the remainder of my life." 

Heard is right now involved with cinematographer Bianca Butti, whom she has been dating since January 2020, however she settled on the choice to have a child on her own some time back and is "glad" to be Oonagh's sole legitimate parent, we're told. The extremist is next set to film "Aquaman 2," in which she plays Atlantean princess Mera opposite Jason Momoa in the lead spot.

A source near Depp revealed to Page Six: "The appointed authority thought she was this brilliant individual supporting humankind," due to her alleged liberality, "however she was lying out of her butt [about the donations]." 

The pair are set to confront a US court next April as Depp is suing Heard over a 2018 Washington Post assessment piece in which she professed to be a casualty of homegrown maltreatment however didn't specify the entertainer by name. 

The source who realizes Heard added: "For the present, the only thing that is in any way important to Amber is Oonagh and raising a good and solid girl." clevver news johnny depp appeal amber heard newborn amber heard aquaman 2 petition barnaby joyce yellowflash 2 big win
